#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int max(int a, int b);
 
int lcs( char *X, char *Y, int m, int n )
{
   int L[m+1][n+1];
   int i, j;
 
   
   for (i=0; i<=m; i++)
   {
     for (j=0; j<=n; j++)
     {
       if (i == 0 || j == 0)
         L[i][j] = 0;
 
       else if (X[i-1] == Y[j-1])
         L[i][j] = L[i-1][j-1] + 1;
 
       else
         L[i][j] = max(L[i-1][j], L[i][j-1]);
     }
   }
   
   return L[m][n];
}
 
int max(int a, int b)
{
    return (a > b)? a : b;
}
 
int main()
{
	
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	
	for(int j=0;j<t;j++)
	{
		int m;
		int n;
		cin >>m>>n;
		char X[m+1];
		char Y[n+1];
		
		scanf("%s",X);
		scanf("%s",Y);
		
		int l=lcs( X, Y, m, n );
		int sum=m+n-l;
		
		
		cout << "Case "<<j+1<<": " << sum << '\n';
		
	}
  
 
  
 
  //printf("Length of LCS is %d\n", lcs( X, Y, m, n ) );
 
 // getchar();
  return 0;
}
